snippet: Marian Hossa had two goals, and Kris Versteeg and Bryan Bickell also scored as the host Chicago Blackhawks beat Anaheim, 4-2, to end the Ducks’ eight-game winning streak.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks beat Anaheim Ducks, 4-2, ending their eight-game winning streak.
lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa had two goals, and Kris Versteeg and Bryan Bickell also scored as the host Chicago Blackhawks beat Anaheim, 4-2, to end the Ducks’ eight-game winning streak.

headline.main: Blackhawks Give Rare Loss to Ducks
